output.sentences: While we were on a hike we came across an obstacle on the trail.
We saw many things in nature including a praying mantis.
In the woods it was easy to reflect on how this world was so simple.
A red ladybug really seemed to pop on the wild greenery.
We came across an amazing view as we were headed off the trail.
